Section.Catchline: Thermal efficiency standards for new nonresidential buildings.

SectionBody.Text: Thermal designs and operations for new nonresidential buildings for which building permits are obtained after March 15, 1979, shall at a minimum take into account exterior envelope physical characteristics, including thermal mass; HVAC, service water heating, energy distribution, lighting, energy managing, and auxiliary systems design and selection; and HVAC, service water heating, energy distribution, lighting, energy managing, and auxiliary equipment performance and shall not be required to meet standards more stringent than the provisions of the Florida Energy Efficiency Code for Building Construction.
